categories: Category:Vader Immortal: A Star Wars VR Series voice actors

nodes.text: Keith James Ferguson (born February 26, 1972) is an American voice actor best-known for being his roles in animated series like Foster's Home for Imaginary Friends and Wander Over Yonder (both produced by Craig McCracken) and in video games like Final Fantasy XII, Kingdom Hearts, Destiny 2 and Overwatch. He also voiced Han Solo and Indiana Jones, Harrison Ford's two most iconic characters, in the comedy stop-motion Adult Swim TV show Robot Chicken, and reprised the role of Han in The Lego Movie.

In Celebration Chicago 2019, Ferguson was announced to be voicing Vylip F'alma in the Star Wars video game Vader Immortal: A Star Wars VR Series – Episode I, the first installment of the Vader Immortal: A Star Wars VR Series video game series, which was released on May 21, 2019.
